articles.title: Xbox Series X Expansion Card India Price and Release Date Announced - IGN India
articles.description: Xbox Series X|S owners will soon be able to upgrade their storage.
articles.content: Seagate has announced that its Storage Expansion Card for Xbox Series X|S will be coming to India on Februaray 8. The expansion card will be priced at Rs. 22,999 at launch, and will offer 1TB of stor… [+878 chars]
